snippet: The representation of motion is the highest reach of art. To convey the idea of action in a figure stirless upon the canvas, is an effort of genius which commonplace artists, if gifted with the ordinary compliment of good sense, are quite loathe t...
lead_paragraph: The representation of motion is the highest reach of art. To convey the idea of action in a figure stirless upon the canvas, is an effort of genius which commonplace artists, if gifted with the ordinary compliment of good sense, are quite loathe to venture upon.
